home.name: Gerardo Martínez
home.desc: I write code with the same passion I answer my cats' meows. 🐱

about.title: About me
about.p1: I'm a fullstack developer with solid experience building robust and scalable web applications. Over the years, I've specialized in ASP.NET and Angular, developing complete business solutions from backend to rich, high-performance interfaces.
about.p2: My days start with coffee and an open terminal, usually accompanied by the soft steps (and constant meows) of my feline companions: Gustavo, Gretta, Gina and Gunter. They taught me what real multitasking is: coding while dodging paws on the keyboard.
about.p3: I firmly believe a good developer not only solves problems, but also anticipates future challenges, writes maintainable code, and collaborates actively with the team.
about.p4: Lately I've also explored Svelte, and I love its minimalist philosophy and the speed it brings to development.

shinsekai.title: Shinsekai Anime Figures Online Store
shinsekai.desc: I developed a fullstack e-commerce from scratch using ASP.NET for the backend and Angular for the frontend. The platform included custom JWT authentication, Stripe payment integration, and SQL Server storage. I implemented an admin panel for the client to manage products and site content. The entire deployment and CI/CD process was automated with Azure DevOps. Although the site was taken down by client decision, the full code is available in my public repository.

footer.made: Made with ❤️ by Lord of cats
